text: Table I: Agents of concern in anaesthesia Safe Banned in Banned at all competition times Propofol Fentanyl Corticosteroids Ketamine Sufentanil Erythropoeitin Thiopentone Alfentanil Colloid fluids Etomidate Morphine Dextrans Midazolam Pethidine Albumin Local Cocaine Mannitol anaesthetics Pentazocine Furosemide Muscle relaxants | Ephedrine Spironalactone Tramadol Adrenaline Diuretics Codeine Pseudoephedrine | Acetazolamide Paracetamol Beta blockers Insulin Antibiotics (certain sports) Salbutamol Anticoagulants Fenotorol Testosterone
